main event: A civilian reported seeing a green and amber disc-shaped object flying at low altitudes in Selma, NC on June 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 25 to 25 1/2 minutes., The sighting involved a combination of ground-visual and ground-radar observations., The object passed overhead at a slight angle., Weather conditions during the sighting were clear with excellent ceiling., Preliminary analysis suggests that the sighting was possibly a balloon.
